name: Perimeter Patrol
Lore: 'Heavy Imperial patrols on Endor forced the Rebels to deploy covertly. The required stealth measures created many complications.',
Text: 'Deploy on Bunker. While you control Bunker, each time opponent deploys a vehicle, starship or Rebel to an Endor site (except Rebel Landing Site), that card cannot move or battle for remainder of turn and opponent must lose 1 Force. (Immune to Alter.)',
